column1: [2]:: select Train_Name from Train as t
column3: Passenger as p where p.SSN = b.Passanger_ssn AND b.Train_Number=t.Train_Number AND first_name = 'Cammy' AND last_name='Albares';

column4: booked  where   booked.train_number = train.train_number AND booked.passanger_ssn = passenger.ssn AND (available_on1 = 'Friday' or available_on2 = 'Friday' or available_on3 = 'Friday');

column10: BOOKED where bdate >= '1963/3/9' and bdate <= '1973/3/9' and TRAIN.Train_Number = BOOKED.Train_Number and BOOKED.Passanger_ssn = PASSENGER.SSN;

column4: booked as b where p.SSN = b.Passanger_ssn AND b.Train_Number=t.Train_Number AND trim(t.Train_Name)= trim('Golden Chariot') AND Staus = 'Booked';

column5: TRAIN where Staus = 'WaitL' and PASSENGER.SSN = BOOKED.Passanger_ssn and BOOKED.Train_Number = TRAIN.Train_Number;

column2: last_name from passenger where phone LIKE '605-___-____' ORDER BY phone desc;

column4: train where booked.passanger_ssn = passenger.ssn AND booked.train_number = train.train_number AND (available_on1 = 'Thursday' OR available_on2 = 'Thursday' OR available_on3 = 'Thursday') ORDER BY first_name
